name: Office, Photographic, Photocopy, and Microfilm Equipment
tcc: R for face-to-face transactions.\nT for nonâ€“face-to-face transactions.
description:
Wholesale distributors of office and photographic equipment such as
film, cash registers, photocopy machines, microfilm machines, vaults
and safes, typewriters, fax machines, adding machines, and mailing
machines.
For wholesalers of office furniture, use MCC 5021.
For wholesalers of computer equipment, use MCC 5045.
